Attilla/Shivah:

Shivah was sat camly reading a cyberbook in one room when =
Attilla arrived, the first-born of Drakonbots didn't noticed that about (At=
tila's arriving ) until his young brother snatched the cybe-book and Attill=
a shouted while he wished annoy his old brother.


"What are you reading Ol=
d-bro??? "THE PREDACON'S WARS... " UGHHH!!! You should better do other thin=
gs than read a bored History book!!!.. " 

"Who doesn't know what were past=
's mistakes, he will make them in the future... If we like beat our enemies=
, we must study our past... it's easy to understand" replyed Shivah aparent=
ly calmed.

"I Insist that you should better do other things, bro" said Att=
illa "Well, my pal Preborn has some complaints and he likes speak with you.=
.. So I leave you alone"

And Attila left the place throwing the cyber-book=
 toward a table that was around, Shivah sighed and waited that Preborn spok=
e.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 4:10 AM
  Subject: Re: It's Showti=
me


  Prebon followed Attilla at a safe distance. He wanted to remain out =
of the other bots reach in case this was some sort of trick. He serveyed ea=
ch twist and turn downloading it to memory so he wouldn't get lost.
    ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
    From: airly2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:49 PM
    Subject: RE: It'=
s Showtime


    "Ok Preborn" said Attilla "Let's go to see Shivah, i can b=
et that I know where's he right now"

    Attilla walked and he invited Pre=
born to follow him



      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBER=
WOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 =
3:38 AM
      Subject: Re: It's Showtime


      Prebons face nearly turned=
 to shock. this bot seemed like it was completely oblivious to the name Pre=
bon. His very name was spoken with honor for being the Trainer of some of t=
he most successfull units in the Predacon army. "My name is Prebon, remembe=
r it with respect and dignity." this bot obviously needed to be taught some=
 order. Prebon began to wonder if that is why he had been selected to trans=
fer to this out of the way rock in the universe.
        ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
        From: airly2000@... 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
        Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:23 PM
        Subject: RE: It=
's Showtime


        Attilla:

        "Don't press your luck, dwarf" said=
 inside his mind the male and told to Preborn with the same tone "Follow me=
... with whom I have the honor?"
          ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          S=
ent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
          Subject: Re: It's Showtime


 =
         Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot was slightly taller an=
d more armored than himself, The former Trainer leader always tried to size=
 up a possible opponent before a fight. "Very well" he said crossing his ar=
ms tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah about how I AM to=
 be treated." His arms went to his sides and he turned towards the door. "I=
f you would be so considerate as to introduce us I would be greatfull" He c=
ontinued in mock courtesy making a request sound like an order.
           =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: airly2000@... 
     =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9=
:13 AM
            Subject: RE: It's Showtime


            Attilla:

     =
       "Nope, it isn't the way " answered  Attilla "What do you think if Sh=
ivah solve this trouble... He can explain you what happened Ok?"
          =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
         =
     To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 1=
0:46 AM
              Subject: Re: It's Showtime


              Prebon ste=
pped out, his memories were either gone or distorted but his leadership pro=
grams were still intact. He remembered how roughly he was treated and how h=
e was slammed into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always cranky when =
he woke up. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Preda=
con emblem on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way =
to treat one of the Predacons best training units?" his record of service w=
ould have spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left the Predacon=
s to start his own unit.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
            From: airly2000@... 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
                Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
               =
 Subject: RE: It's Showtime


                Attilla:

                "Me=
mories erased, reprogramation ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to s=
tart duties."

                Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr'=
s door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

                The bot was ready to fight just =
in case.
